description: This file defines a React component for a notes management page, including hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes, as well as UI components for displaying and editing notes.

classes.name: useNotes
classes.description: Custom React hook for managing notes state, including fetching, error handling, and refresh logic.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Hook to fetch and manage notes data, providing loading state, error state, and refresh capability.

methods.name: NotesPage
methods.description: Main React component for the notes page, handling note selection, search, tags, and CRUD operations.

methods.name: handleCreateNew
methods.description: Creates a new note with default title and adds it to the state.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the current draft as a new note or updates the existing selected note.

methods.name: toggleTag
methods.description: Toggles the selection of a tag for filtering notes.
